Player History
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 4/1/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $1,640,000 per year...
Traded from New York (M) to San Diego on 4/25/1985 (Going to SD: LF Kevin Mitchell. Going to NYM: P Donnie Moore, C Terry Kennedy, SS Garry Templeton)...
Injured on 7/18/1986 with a Sprained Ankle, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit on 4/4/1987, off Teddy Higuera (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/11/1987, off Reggie Patterson (CHC)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/17/1987, hitting .414 with 5 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/1/1987, hitting .400 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1987, hitting .350 with 10 HR, 22 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/8/1987, hitting .526 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Hit 3 homeruns against St. Louis, driving in 6 runs on 10/3/1987...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1987, hitting .318 with 33 HR, 102 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/31/1988, hitting .560 with 4 HR, 14 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1988, hitting .341 with 7 HR, 25 RBI...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $4,871,429 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/24/1989, hitting .579 with 5 HR, 13 RBI...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $5,371,429 through salary arbitration...
Drove in 6 runs against Pittsburgh on 4/17/1990...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago on 10/9/1990...
2/2/1991: Gets a new one-year contract worth $5,371,429 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/1991, hitting .429 with 4 HR, 6 RBI...
